meanings.sent1: She nodded consentingly when asked to join the team.
meanings.sent2: The group members all smiled consentingly at the new proposal.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail consentingly when offered a treat.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed consentingly under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The children played consentingly in the park, enjoying the sunny day.

meanings.definition: In a manner that shows agreement or approval.
meanings.sent1: He clapped consentingly after the performance.
meanings.sent2: The audience cheered consentingly for the winning team.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred consentingly while being petted.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled consentingly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed consentingly through the peaceful valley.
